body_html:
PyYAML has had it's last commit made in February this year: https://github.com/yaml/pyyaml

Fair enough :-)

Coupled with

Have you tried ruamel.yaml as a drop-in replacement?

Yes... but only with pip. With conda, I've also tried, but seems to be packaged into a different namespace.

=> I think I'll close this for now.

Fair enough :-)

body:
> PyYAML has had it's last commit made in February this year: https://github.com/yaml/pyyaml

Fair enough :-)

Coupled with

> Have you tried ruamel.yaml as a drop-in replacement?

Yes... but only with `pip`. With `conda`, I've also tried, but seems to be packaged into a different namespace.

=> I think I'll close this for now.
